title: Tasmanian wild life
creator_credit: Tasmanian State Film Unit and Don Anderson
brief_description: Tasmania’s characteristic rough mountainous terrain serves as a sanctuary for preserving its natural wildlife. Features the Tasmanian devil and Tasmanian tiger.
creator_credit_for_label: Tasmanian State Film Unit and Don Anderson
